description:
A simple Chart JS3 time-based Line Chart element.
Two series of data can be displayed. Simple X and Y axis can be customize.
name: ChartJS 3 Time Series Line Chart
plugin_instructions:
The chart is drawn by passing an array of time data for X and an array of numeric data for Y1/Y2 in the action.

All X, Y1, Y2 data must have same length.
